sed:FunctionLibrary.dc:title: SPARQL Function Library for Media Fragments
sed:FunctionLibrary.dc:description: SPARQL Function Library for handling Media Fragments URI like they are recommended from W3C at Media Fragments URI 1.0 (basic) recommendation.

ssd:extensionFunction.rdfs:label: after
ssd:extensionFunction.dc:description: returns *true* if resource1.start >= resource2.end, else *false*.

ssd:extensionFunction.rdfs:label: before
ssd:extensionFunction.dc:description: returns *true* if resource1.end <= resource2.start, else *false*.

ssd:extensionFunction.rdfs:label: temporalContains
ssd:extensionFunction.dc:description: returns *true* if resource1.start <= resource2.start and resource1.end >= resource2.end, else *false*. Boolean *flag* can define if *equal* is included in the result, default is *false*.

ssd:extensionFunction.rdfs:label: temporalEqual
ssd:extensionFunction.dc:description: returns *true* if resource1.start == resource2.start and resource1.end == resource2.end, else *false*.
ssd:extensionFunction.rdfs:label: temporalEqual
ssd:extensionFunction.dc:description: returns *true* if resource1.box == resource2.box, else *false*.

ssd:extensionFunction.rdfs:label: finishes
ssd:extensionFunction.dc:description: returns *true* if resource1.end == resource2.end and resource1.start > resource1.start , else *false*. Boolean *flag* can define if *equal* is included in the result, default is *false*.

ssd:extensionFunction.rdfs:label: temporalMeets
ssd:extensionFunction.dc:description: returns *true* if resource1.start = resource2.end or resource1.end = resource2.start, else *false*.

ssd:extensionFunction.rdfs:label: temporalOverlaps
ssd:extensionFunction.dc:description: returns *true* if resource1.start < resource2.start < resource1.end < resource2.end or resource2.start < resource1.start < resource2.end < resource1.end, else *false*. Boolean *flag* can define if *equal* is included in the result, default is *false*.

ssd:extensionFunction.rdfs:label: starts
ssd:extensionFunction.dc:description: returns *true* if resource1.start == resource2.start and resource1.end < resource2.end , else *false*. Boolean *flag* can define if *equal* is included in the result, default is *false*.

ssd:extensionAggregate.rdfs:label: temporalBoundingBox
ssd:extensionAggregate.dc:description: returns new *MediaFragmentURI* with temporal fragment ( Min( resource1.start, resource2.start ), Max( resource1.end, resource2.end ) ).

ssd:extensionAggregate.rdfs:label: temporalIntermediate
ssd:extensionAggregate.dc:description: returns new *MediaFragmentURI* with temporal fragment ( Min( resource1.end, resource2.end ), Max( resource1.start, resource2.start ) ) if intersection not exists, else *null*.

ssd:extensionAggregate.rdfs:label: temporalIntersection
ssd:extensionAggregate.dc:description: returns new *MediaFragmentURI* with temporal fragment ( Max( resource1.start, resource2.start ), Min( resource1.end, resource2.end ) ) if intersection exists, else *null*.

ssd:extensionFunction.rdfs:label: temporalCovers
ssd:extensionFunction.dc:description: returns *true* if all points of resource1.box are points of resource2.box, else *false*. Boolean *flag* can define if *equal* is included in the result, default is *false*.

ssd:extensionFunction.rdfs:label: temporalDisjoint
ssd:extensionFunction.dc:description: returns *true* is resource1.box has no common points with resource2.box, else *false*.

ssd:extensionFunction.rdfs:label: temporalIntersects
ssd:extensionFunction.dc:description: returns *true* if resource1.box has at least one common point with resource2.box, else *false*. Boolean *flag* can define if *equal* is included in the result, default is *false*.

ssd:extensionFunction.rdfs:label: temporalTouches
ssd:extensionFunction.dc:description: returns *true* if resource1.box.edge has at least one common point with resource2.box.edge and resource1.box.interior has no common point with resource2.box.interior, else *false*.

ssd:extensionFunction.rdfs:label: bottom
ssd:extensionFunction.dc:description: returns *true* if resource.y >= 50%.

ssd:extensionFunction.rdfs:label: isAbove
ssd:extensionFunction.dc:description: returns *true* if resource1.y + resource1.h <= resource2.y, else *false*.

ssd:extensionFunction.rdfs:label: isBelow
ssd:extensionFunction.dc:description: returns *true* if resource2.y + resource2.h <= resource1.y, else *false*.

ssd:extensionFunction.rdfs:label: left
ssd:extensionFunction.dc:description: returns *true* if resource.x + resource.w <= 50%.

ssd:extensionFunction.rdfs:label: leftBeside
ssd:extensionFunction.dc:description: returns *true* if resource1.x + resource1.w <= resource2.x, else *false*.

ssd:extensionFunction.rdfs:label: right
ssd:extensionFunction.dc:description: returns *true* if resource.x >= 50%.

ssd:extensionFunction.rdfs:label: rightBeside
ssd:extensionFunction.dc:description: returns *true* if resource2.x + resource2.w <= resource1.x, else *false*.

ssd:extensionFunction.rdfs:label: top
ssd:extensionFunction.dc:description: returns *true* if resource.y + resource.h <= 50%.

ssd:extensionAggregate.rdfs:label: spatialBoundingBox
ssd:extensionAggregate.dc:description: returns new *MediaFragmentURI* with spatial fragment out of existing resources A and B, so that x = min( A.x, B.x ) and y = min( A.y, B.y ) and w = max( A.x + A.w, B.x + B.w ) and h = max( A.y + A.h, B.y + B.h ).

ssd:extensionAggregate.rdfs:label: spatialIntersection
ssd:extensionAggregate.dc:description: returns new *MediaFragmentURI* with spatial fragment out of existing resources A and B, so that x = max( A.x, B.x ) and y = max( A.y, B.y ) and w = min( A.x + A.w, B.x + B.w ) - max( A.x, B.x ) and h = min( A.y + A.h, B.y + B.h ) - max( A.y, A.x )

ssd:extensionAggregate.rdfs:label: boundingBox
ssd:extensionAggregate.dc:description: returns new *MediaFragmentURI* with spatial and temporal fragment. It it works like spatialFunction:boundingBox, temporalFunction:boundingBox or both together.

ssd:extensionAggregate.rdfs:label: intersection
ssd:extensionAggregate.dc:description: returns new *MediaFragmentURI* with spatial and temporal fragment. It works like spatialFunction:boundingBox, temporalFunction:intersection and both.
